Trigger The Melfesh Monster dies

Effect The Melfesh Monster explodes in a @Template[burst|distance:30]. Creatures in the area take @Damage[3d8[fire],3d8[poison]|options:area-damage]{3d8 fire and 3d8 poison damage} (@Check[reflex|dc:24|basic|name:Death Throes|options:area-effect] save). This ability replaces Reactive Growth.
